title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Chris Broussard and Jason McIntyre step in to give their thoughts on Kevin Durant’s future and what it would mean for his legacy if he returned to the Golden State Warriors. They debate the likelihood the Lakers should consider trading LeBron James for another NBA superstar. Chris explains why he believes Lamar Jackson has limitation despite his success in the NFL. Plus, NBA champion Eddie House joins the show to share his take on how KD ranks in today’s NBA landscape.

#oddcouple #straightfire

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
